mapper.sql: goods_Num , goods_name , goods_price ,goods_contents , emp_num ,goods_regist , GOODS_MAIN_IMAGE ,GOODS_MAIN_STORE_IMAGE , GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE ,GOODS_DETAIL_STORE_IMAGE , visit_count ,update_Emp_Num , goods_Update_Date
mapper.insert: insert into goods ( goods_num, goods_name, goods_Price, goods_contents) values(#{goodsNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsContents})
mapper.select: select goods_num, goods_name, goods_price, goods_contents from goods
